description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Ignis Puzzle your way through 115 new levels - All levels include the brand new "Spiral" mechanic!

name: Graviteam Tactics: Counter Blow
description: The offensive of 4A of Volkhov Front on Tikhvin, in November 1941. The Red Army is trying to block the German forces from 39AC in the Tikhvin area. German units are transferring reserves to this sector of the front.

name: Fire and Maneuver: Expansion - Boshin War
description: Join the Boshin War as Imperialists or Shogunate loyalists in the second expansion to The Armchair Historian's Fire & Maneuver. Take charge during the turbulent end of Japan's samurai era, or ignite East vs. West clashes with inventive scenarios!

name: It Belongs in a Museum
description: It Belongs in a Museum is a Rogue-lite, treasure hunting, artifact collection VR story game. Join a shadow organization and help its weakened, resurrected goddess search for magic treasures to undo the curse they unleashed in procedural dungeons, tombs, lost cities, and ancient ruins.

name: NTBSS: Master Character Training Pack - Minato Namikaze (Reanimation)
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Minato Namikaze (Reanimation) as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: Catacomb Master
description:
Catacomb Master is a 2d platform game in which you have to play as a treasure hunter cat. Go down into the depths of the catacombs for treasures, use your bow and arrows, test your ingenuity.

Find treasures to become a true Catacomb Master.

name: Merge & Blade: Puppy Charater
description: "Puppy" barks loudly at enemies! This is a great addition to the battle, as many enemies will stiffen after hearing his bark. By the way, this guy is nice and doesn't bite, so don't be scared.

name: Merge & Blade: Mineral mine
description: Assemble the best units to mine minerals.

name: Merge & Blade: Berserker
description: 'Berserker' is a character whose damage increases more and more when hit. It's a character that gets stronger and stronger the more you fight at the front, and it's always hungry for battle.

name: Xel: Breaking Time
description: A new chapter of Reid's story awaits. Travel back in time to the Xel, meet old friends, make new ones and change the future.

name: Plastic Tape
description:
Snapshots of a life through bandages.

You start your new life abroad with your phone and an opened box of eight bandages in your bag.

name: Sorcerer's Choice: Angel or Demon? Steam Version
description:
Sorcerer’s Choice: Angel or Demon? is a dark fantasy visual novel that tells the story of a boy called Lucil, the grandson of a great magician. After his house is attacked by a mob, his grandfather teleports him to safety. Burned and battered, Lucil is aware of two beings standing over him: one of Light, and one of Darkness.

Which hand will he take? What fate awaits him when he chooses?

name: Xel: Complete Edition
description: XEL is an epic 3D sci-fi fantasy action-adventure.

name: Xel: Breaking Time
description:
A new chapter of Reid’s story awaits. Travel back in time to the XEL, meet old friends, make new ones and change the future.

"Breaking Time" picks up right after the dramatic conclusion of XEL. Can Reid change the fate with her new powers? Or will she undo everything out of another selfish urge. Take a plunge into XELs past, defeat new bosses and master new puzzles. Ready your gadgets and follow Reid on her new journey.

name: The Sims 4: Greenhouse Haven Kit
description: The Sims 4 Greenhouse Haven Kit

name: NachoCado
description: Jump right into the wacky battle of survival. Shot your nacho enemies down with your powerful seed, and watch them crumble to corn dust. Discover the true power of Avocado!

name: Varial
description: Varial is a single player skateboarding-action game where you play as the titular character fighting a giant robot called the "Y.2.K.A.I.J.U.". The game takes place in a Y2K apocalypse, where all the technology has revolted against humanity and wiped out most of the population.

name: Hyper Hentai Elf Attendant
description: Hyper Hentai Elf Attendant is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of elf attendant and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Pigeon Protocol
description: Play with up to 30 of your friends in this frantic bird based online game! Customize your pigeon, Compete to build nests, own territory and to keep hold of shiny things. But watch out, its a bird eat bird world out there!

name: Sensual Adventures: Episode 7
description: EP7 takes place 4 years before the start of EP1, a time when the girls had only just met and were starting their adventures and tumultuous relationship together. As Futanari, the girls are always ready to fuck and have a habit of finding their way into bed with anyone and everyone… even the enemy.

name: Akhra: The Treasures
description: Go on a journey into the fantastic world of Akhra! Construct and use the ancient, powerful artifacts in order to find all of the hidden treasures. Earn powerful skills you can use to solve the puzzles. Enjoy the peaceful music and relaxing atmosphere in this phantastic Match-3 game.

name: Typing Tempo
description: Typing Tempo is a 41-key 2D typing rhythm game developed by Rainbeat Games.

name: Girls Love Toys
description: Girls Love Toys - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: College Bound: Episode 5
description: College Bound: Episode 5 DLC is the final part of the epic adult visual novel developed by FOZ. Bigger, better and naughtier than ever before. Are you ready?

name: Moe Waifu H
description: Feel the rhythm of her heart in a quick-thinking match game!

name: Dungeons & Jewels
description:
Dungeons & Jewels is a Tile-Matching Roguelike.
Collect Relics. Learn Spells. Fight monsters and use your abilities by matching tiles, creating combos, and solving puzzles!

name: Core Crossing
description: First-person dungeon crawler RPG. Build your party and explore the labyrinth known as the "Core" under the Town of Melodiena. Successful adventurers shall be granted the town's coveted Revere License.

name: Hope's End
description: Hope's End is a post-apocalyptic tower defense roguelite with an emphasis on active ability use to succeed. Play as the Supreme Psion and use unique ability sets to rain destruction down upon the monsters that threaten humanity's final bastion!

name: Fort Valen
description: A desert fantasy murder-mystery following young involuntary shut-in Vishara Vakricustos as she attempts to solve a murder plot to prove herself to her overprotective mother.

name: Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising
description: Ten-hut! It’s time for basic training on the Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp game! Guide your units in tactical, turn-based battles, find the CO Power that best fits your playstyle, and defend your HQ from opposing nations.

name: Advance Wars
description: Lead a cast of colorful characters in fun, turn-based battles with two classic campaigns.

name: Kiro II: The Wizards Guild
description: Kiro II: The Wizards Guild is a fantasy based multiplayer dungeon crawler in which up to six players can join online together to navigate through semi-procedurally generated dungeons using a classic text command system to slay monsters, collect loot, and defeat dungeon bosses.

name: Hyperhell
description: HYPERHELL is a breakneck top-down movement shooter featuring the talents of several prolific hyperpop musicians. Obliterate your way through a colorful city of demons to reclaim what was stolen from you: a fully stocked fridge.

name: Every Summer Holiday
description: While visiting a small town during the summer holiday, Henry meets two older boys named Jason and Eddie. The three hang out daily, and Henry starts seeing them as his older brothers. Henry has to say goodbye to his friends when the holiday ends, but they will reunite another summer.

name: Enter/Exit the Gungeon
description:
Enter the Gungeon is a bullet hell dungeon crawler following a band of misfits seeking to shoot, loot, dodge roll and table-flip their way to personal absolution by reaching the legendary Gungeon’s ultimate treasure: the gun that can kill the past.

Exit the Gungeon is a small, spin-off 'dungeon climber' immediately following the adventures of the misfit Gungeoneers.

name: Ankora: Lost Days & Deiland: Pocket Planet - Collector's Edition
description: Discover the wild planet of Ankora in a single-player survival adventure with exploration and crafting. A tale about growing up, making friends and connecting with nature.

name: Homestead Arcana
description: Become a farming Witch and pioneer the range that has been mysteriously corrupted with Miasma. Discover the secret behind its appearance, grow plants to power up your spells, and use nature’s magic to heal the land. Build your very own homestead from the ground up. Discover new plants and tend to your ever-growing garden to heal the land and make it your own.

name: VR Tribes
description: VR Tribes is an action-packed and strategic online multiplayer battle. One in VR and up to three as PC players. As VR player you have to conquer the island and protect your magical crystals. The PC players have to join together to attack and defeat the VR player.

name: Dead Island 2: Day One Edition
description:
Dead Island 2 takes players across the most iconic locations of the City of Angels, now stained with horror, in an exciting pulp journey from the verdant suburbia of Beverly Hills to the quirky promenade of Venice Beach.
Combat delivers the most intense, visceral and gory first person experience possible, with plenty of weapons and tactical (and brutal) options to chew your way through the zombie horde.

Day 1 Edition includes:
- The Memories of Banoi Pack
- Banoi War Club
- Memories of Banoi Baseball Bat
- Weapon Perk – balanced
- Personal space skill card

name: Dead Island 2: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes two premium character packs, featuring a unique costume and weapon, and the Golden Weapons Pack. Pre-purchase now and get the Memories of Banoi pack, with two weapons, a special weapon perk and skill card.

name: Dead Island 2: Gold Edition
description: The Gold Edition includes the Expansion Pass. A deadly virus is spreading across Los Angeles, turning its inhabitants into zombies. Survive, evolve and become the ultimate Zombie Slayer.

name: Fight Club: All Stars
description: Absolutely accurate and totally precise physics based ragdoll fighting)))

name: Minigunner
description: Fight to survive in this intense twin-stick shooter! Collect sentries, items, and drones as you unleash mayhem to defend a mining outpost from waves of goopy monsters that emerge from below.

name: Roll Player
description: In Roll Player your goal is to create the best role playing character. Roll and draft dice to build up your character’s attributes. Purchase weapons and armor to outfit your hero. Train to gain skills and discover your hero’s traits to prepare them for their journey.

name: Total Conflict: Resistance
description: Total Conflict: Resistance is a unique symbiosis of global strategy, tactics and first-person action. Realistic mass battles, many types of armored vehicles, weapons, uniforms, unique mechanics, immersive free gameplay. Lead any state and bring it to greatness!

name: Volcano Princess
description: After the war between humans and demons, you found a baby on the battlefield and became a father. You will Plan time and courses for her, bring her into contact with various roles, and raise her up. The daughter's future and the ending of the volcano country depends on each of your choices.

name: Advance Wars 1+2: Re-Boot Camp
description: Command an army in strategic, turn-based combat as a tactical adviser for the Orange Star Army. Your expertise is needed as you move land, air, and naval units across the battlefield. Take down enemy squads and capture towns and bases to secure victory and keep the peace. Keep an eye on the game-changing terrain and weather as you lead a variety of units across multiple maps. This remake features two campaigns that cover the events of Advance Wars and Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising!

name: Dead Island 2
description: Dead Island 2 is a survival horror first-person shooter set in a zombie apocalypse in Los Angeles. Players explore an open world, gathering resources, interacting with survivors, and battling swarms of zombies in fast-paced combat. Set fifteen years after the events of Dead Island: Riptide, the game features a new cast of characters and narrative, while maintaining the series’ signature blend of brutal melee action and immersive environments.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: Putin's Posters in the Train Car
description:
This DLC adds Vladimir Putin posters to your compartment car.

The posters hang on two walls and always delight your eye, no matter where you sit.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: A Beautiful Girl In Your Place
description:
This DLC adds a girl companion to your compartment car.

The girl lies on top of your seat and is pleasing to the eye.

name: Russian Train Trip 2: VIP Seat In The Train Car
description:
This DLC makes a real VIP seat out of your compartment car, which includes:

Various items on the table (pizza, soda, mug, etc.)
Posters
Headphones
Other items.

name: Sun's Edge
description: What would you do if the world was ending? In Sun's Edge, you are a ranger exploring the island of Solasta, trying to find a way to keep the world from falling to darkness! In this Aztec themed adventure game, you will need to fight, climb, and solve your way out of problems. Everyone is counting on you!

name: Kanon
description: The remastered version of Kanon, which features the CGs in high definition and color corrected and includes full voice-acting utilizing both recordings made in the Dreamcast/PS2 and PSP releases of the game (minus Shiori, whose non-PSP lines were newly recorded) and touchscreen support.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Free Update #2
description:
The second free update for Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed added the S.C.Y. County Courthouse map, the Possessor ghost type with 3 new ghosts, Trap Minions that can be placed in objects or on the ground and Dredges that can be summoned to help distract the Busters.

Alongside the general rebalancing and bug fixes it also added more customization options with new Gear Shells and cosmetics based on the Extreme Ghostbusters Cartoon series, makeup styles with numerous color options, shirt logos for compatible tops, gear tints and new Ghostbuster cosmetics including footwear, a skirt and kilt bottom.

name: Blood Moon
description: You’re a werewolf. You’re in a city, infested with witches, hunters, ghosts, and vampires. That’s how this story starts. You decide how it ends.

name: SM64: Rocky Mountain Revisited
description: Super Mario 64: Rocky Mountain Revisted is a 7-star mini-hack that reimagines the old version of Whomp's Fortress from its Spaceworld 95' demo, also known as Rocky Mountain.

name: Life Changer
description: Life Changer is a life simulation RPG where you can take on a solo or multiplayer path of personal development. Seek opportunities through exploration, acquire skills, education, advance your career, invest, and grow businesses to achieve life goals and realize your dream life.

name: Something's in the Air Redux
description:
Something’s In The Air Redux is a sequel to Date Ariane Remastered, but it is designed to be a stand-alone game.

In part, a remastering of the original Something’s In The Air (2013), but with a streamlined story and playable as either a straight male or gay female character each with slightly different content.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Title Update 5
description: The Looming Calamity, Amatsu, has set its gaze on Kamura Village. Experience the thrilling climax to the Monster Hunter Rise story with Free Title Update 5.

name: Ano, Subarashii wo Mou Ichido: Saisouban HD
description: A remake of the 1999 visual novel.

name: DC Universe Online: Episode 45 - Shock to the System
description: Shock to the System is tier 6 playable content that contains the open world Dakota City, the duo Shock: Abandoned Subway, the alert Shock: Meta-Therapy Clinic and the raid Shock: The Terrorium.

name: Katoa
description: Create living habitats & help save the real world too! Build & nurture exotic, living habitats in Katoa, and help the real-world too! Habitats you grow, nurture, and protect in-game contribute $ to Earth Day, Great Barrier Reef Foundation, Save The Penguins & SOA. $50,000 campaign for Earth Day in May!

name: Win Over the Flawed Girl
description: Win Over the Flawed Girl is an easy two-choice puzzle game to make the little flawed beauty girls (monsters, spirits and ghosts) happy！

name: Elena's Journal: To Atlantis
description: Discover the lost secrets of Atlantis in this Time Management Adventure!

name: Plague Universe
description:
Bundled together 3 games within the Plague Universe:

- Death Tales, a action platforming rpg.
- Plague Road, a turn based rogue lite rpg.
- War Theatre, a turn based strategy rpg.

name: Arcade Archives: Cosmo Gang the Video
description:
Clear the stage by defeating all the Cozmo Gangs in the Gang.
If you hit the enemy's attack, you will lose one "Hyper Beat", and if you lose everything, the game will be over.

name: Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey - End of the story
description: Discover the full saga of Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey with this enthralling Full-Story-Unlock DLC! Uncover Fenrir's untold story, unveil the secrets behind his fury, and rescue Midgard from doom.

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel-Mech Pilot
description: After unlocking DLC, it can be activated and played by Mech Pilot within the game.

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel-Gambler
description: After unlocking DLC, it can be activated and played by Gambler within the game.

name: Sea Dove
description: The man in the black sphere needs you to catch him some fish, but to what end?

name: Zcrew: The Void Realm
description: Survive the post-apocalyptic world and face the rise of the Void! In the "Void Realm" DLC, you can once again improve your strength and prepare for future missions. Fight alone or join forces with your friends, challenge the levels, break through the limits, and dominate the Void!

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Temple at Zerzura
description: The ultimate sand trap—the Sahara Desert—recedes after a thousand years, revealing a mini golf course fit for an Egyptian king and queen! Putt through the serene dunes, vast throne room, and great pyramids as you search for clues and lost balls within the forgotten temple.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack Hong Meiling
description:
The seventh pack of additional characters is here!

Ladies and Gentlemen!
Introducing "Hong Meiling" the gatekeeper of the Scarlet Devil Mansion!
Utilize her Charge Shot ability with the R Button to increase her attack power!
She's an aggressive character with unique spell cards!

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Adventure Academia - The Fractured Continent Collab: Additional Characters Pack
description:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent".

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Akiba's Beat Collaboration - Additional Characters Pack
description:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
Akiba's Beat characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Akiba's Beat".

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Akiba's Trip Collaboration - Additional Characters Pack
description:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
AKIBA'S TRIP characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Akiba's Trip".

name: Labyrinth of Zangetsu: Mind=.0 Collaboration - Additional Characters Pack
description:
Atmospheric turn-based dungeon crawler with Japanese yokai folklore reimagined!
Mind=.0 characters entering the world of Labyrinth of Zangetsu.
This DLC will add 8 characters as playable characters to Labyrinth of Zangetsu from "Mind=.0".

name: The Sims 4: Basement Treasures Kit
description: Hand-me-down furniture and forgotten favorites await in The Sims 4 Basement Treasures Kit.

name: Alicia Griffith: Lakeside Murder Collector's Edition
description: Murder took place and local sheriff needs your help!

name: Story of Abandoned School
description: An Abandoned School where children used to study and teachers used to work, has become a local nightmare for local residents, every local resident knows that you can’t visit this place and even approach it, strange things happened there in the past

name: Back to Childhood: Classic Games Collection
description: Meet and play with familiar faces from your childhood in this bundle that feels like a cartoon break after school

name: Gotta Go Fast: Racing Collection
description: Speed up to surpass yourself!

name: Deceive Inc.: Misery Empire
description: A ghost from Ace's past has returned to break hearts and take names in Misery Empire: Deceive Inc's first seasonal catalog update. Featuring tons of gameplay improvements and fixes, over 50 exclusive new items to unlock, and Red - the devilishly charming new Scoundrel Agent!

name: Hazama_Queen
description: In the year 202X, the world is "Yami"...! To save the world, go to hell and kill all the demons. Yes, just like ordering a Frappuccino at a cool cafe!

name: Shooting Star VR
description: Become a hero in Shooting Star VR! Choose from 4 themes and 100 stages to save the goddess of Archery Land with your magic bow. Travel through forests, lava pits, icy mountains, and space to defeat monsters and restore peace. Get ready for thrilling challenges and heroic feats

name: Neon Echo
description: Neon Echo is a 3D side-scrolling action Roguelite game with an anime and tech-wear style.

name: Jigsaw Kitties
description: A cute jigsaw puzzle game with over 60 cute cartoon kitties to unlock

name: Backgammon Pro for Nintendo Switch
description:
Utilizing AI machine learning and game record analysis, this is as authentic as Backgammon gets!
It even supports online multiplayer!

The last scenery you faced was a quite unfamiliar hotel office. Leaving all the uncertainties behind, you have to perform significant or insignificant tasks from here on out. -256 is a pixel graphics first-person mystery hotel walking simulator.

name: Summer Bubble Splash
description: Solve fun matching puzzles underwater and use different boosters to splash to the next level!

name: Japanese Nekosama Games: The Outlaws
description:
Get back the stolen canned cat food
And Save cats' food crisis!

name: Sunrise GP
description: Sunrise GP takes you on a nostalgic journey with its retro-styled cars, racing through breathtaking locations. Personalize the look of your beloved car, immerse yourself in a soothing soundtrack, and continuously improve your racing times - everything is designed to help you relax and soak up the laid-back atmosphere.

name: Princess of Mekana
description: After the King of Mekana falls ill to a mysterious illness, possibly due to poison, the Princess of Mekana must take regency and successfully claim the throne against various forces acting against her.

name: Buccanyar
description: The game consists of two major parts: a nautical mode in which you operate your own ship with AI cats (crew) and go on adventures, fighting other ships and sea monsters, and a port mode in which you customize your ship, replace crew, and cash in resources obtained in battle.

name: Melonizard
description: 2D Adventure/Action game where stealth is at the forefront. With 22 separate levels, each one offering a different experience, you'll be asked to be careful and overcome the different obstacles to reach the fruit at the end of each level!

name: Castle War
description: In this real time strategy game, defeat your friends by destroying their castle. The last player with their castle still standing wins! Players must manage their economy, build their base and defenses, while producing and upgrading their units.

name: L'affaire est Dans le Sac
description: In an investigation where the thieves are not necessarily the ones you think they are, follow the clues, question the suspects, and get to the truth by avoiding false leads. But beware, some people are not ready to give up so easily.

name: Edelweiss
description: "Edelweiss" is a Japanese-inspired horror RPG that follows the journey of Ayla and her friend lost in a dense forest with no cellphone signal. In search of assistance, Ayla with her friends found to an abandoned orphanage, setting the stage for a spine-chilling horror narrative.

name: StreetStep: 21st Century Basketball
description: An Action Packed game of 3 on 3 Basketball! Duke it out against your friends in a frantic Basketball Battle!

name: Hentai Ellie
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Gemcrusty
description: This game is about treasure hunters who dig underground to find valuable gems.

name: I Know This Place..?
description: The 1st chapter of an experimental mystic quest game with the atmosphere of Eastern Europe of the last century. After completing the 1st chapter, each player can influence the further plot of the game. What will happen in the next chapters, even we do not know.The plot is in your hands...

name: Rainbowcore Hypernova
description: Unleash your inner fighter in Rainbowcore Hypernova, the explosively fun and free fighting game featuring vibrant characters, easy controls, and dynamic battles

name: Molly Medusa: Queen of Spit
description: Poor Molly, all your friends are stone!

name: The Last Dragon Slayer
description:
Go it alone... Or team up with friends!
Four Heroes arrive on the shores of Baelor, a Kingdom ravaged by the tyrannic rule of a Dragon. In order to defeat this Pagan Idol, you'll first need to scour the deep depths of mysterious dungeons, labyrinthic caves, and lush terrains.

Team up in Local Co-Op gameplay! Find secrets, collect upgrades, and power up on your journey to become the Last Dragon Slayer!

name: DNF Duel: Who's Next
description:
The Nintendo Switch version of DNF Duel uses delay-based netcode instead of the rollback netcode used in the original releases. None of the releases currently support crossplay.

Action fighting at its extreme! One of the most popular and widely played RPGs in the world, Dungeon and Fighter is now back as a 2.5D action fighting game. Choose from 16 charming characters, each with their distinct skills and personalities. Outsmart, outplay, or downright beat up your opponents and become the master of the Ultimate Will!

name: Akiba's Trip: Undead & Undressed - Director's Cut
description: First released in the West in 2014, AKIBA’s TRIP: Undead & Undressed brings the vampire-slaying action-RPG to the Nintendo Switch for the first time as the Director’s Cut. This new edition features all the awesome otaku content from the previous release, including the original game’s DLC, plus an all-new story route focusing on the lovable Finnish maid Kati Räikkönen, complete with all-new voice over in Japanese and English featuring the original cast.

name: Busway Islands
description: Busway Islands is a puzzle game about organizing roads and rails across a large archipelago. Your goal is to create a safe and efficient route between bus stations, ensuring that all passengers are picked up along the way.

name: Ancient Saga: Vikings Journey
description: Thor and the Vikings are on a mission to save Midgard from Fenrir. To achieve their aim, they take a daring journey to Ancient Greece in search of a remedy. However, they soon realize that the task ahead of them will be harder than they imagined.

name: Abyss
description: Abyss is a story-oriented horror game. Players will explore abandoned tourist facilities with abnormal phenomena in the first person, looking for various clues, and unraveling the buried past.

name: The Last Duskreaper
description: Try this hardcore side view metroidvania that tells the story of a bird in a dying kingdom infected by glitched monsters.

name: Freedom's Twilight
description: Summoned to the strange dark fantasy world of Amissus you will encounter both natural and supernatural obstacles as you explore, collect, craft, learn, build, and survive the fog blanketed realm. Fight back the abhorrent creatures of darkness and build yourself a place you can call home.

name: Between
description: An Interactive first-person game. Help Elures navigate through the labyrinth of dreams and uncover the secret of extraneous memories.

name: Just Xiangqi
description: This is a refreshing Chinese chess game with realistic graphics and a detailed audio tutorial that will keep you entertained, even as a novice. A variety of well-designed challenges will test your tactics. Sit back and relax, as you transform into a master of strategy.

name: 100 Hidden Frogs 2
description: 100 hidden frogs 2 is a hidden object game in the magic medieval setting. Colorful 3D graphics. A level that can be viewed from all sides.

name: Dead Unending
description: A deadly virus plagues the city in Null County and the residents now roam the streets as flesh-eating zombies. Tactically loot the massive open world and build a self-sustaining zombie-killing fortress. Will you be able to survive the apocalypse or will you become one of the undead?

name: BattleCrypt Bombers
description: BattleCrypt Bombers is a pixel-packed arena combat game for up to four local players. Collect and lob bombs but be careful - explosions set off chain reactions that are deadly to everyone! Play competitively or cooperatively across two different game modes.

name: A Drop of Hope
description: Use your different physical properties and states of matter to overcome challenges in this 2D puzzle platformer. Set in an oppressive industrial world dominated by machines, you are the only hope to restore nature and save the planet.

name: Skader
description: A sci-fi MOBA with unique ice-skating locomotion and a trail generator device to catch your enemies. Use power-ups to gain an advantage, coordinate with the team, and fight for your universe in a final multiverse battle for the ancient rune to save your world.

name: Antrabhara
description: In a world where humans and monsters coexist, three boys and girls with different identities meet in an abandoned old house. During the adventure together, they collect props, solve puzzles, escape from indescribable creatures, uncover the bloody history behind the ancient house family, and finally discover the secret of the "bardo".

name: Divine Dawn
description: Divine Dawn is an adult role-playing game following an ambitious would-be hero, balancing story, sex, characters, and combat. Customize your character, romance humans and monster girls, and evade or embrace otherworldly powers.

name: Skeleton Punchers
description: Explosive 2D Pixel Art Action! Help the Skeleton Punchers defeat the Zerpian army of the night and recover the Patrician's Hoard before it's too late!

name: Unpogable
description:
Unpogable is a 2D platformer all about precise platforming!

You'll not only use one pogo stick to navigate through each level, but two! It's not as easy as it sounds. Unpogable will challenge all your platforming and pogo skills.
The huge campaign level will teach you all the necessary skills you need to succeed! It starts easy and gets more difficult the further you get, just like life. Falling can mean a huge loss of progress, so be careful!

Once you're ready, you can try completing the daily challenge levels! It's a new level every day, randomly generated and the same for every player! Or, use your own seeds to generate levels. The perfect feature to challenge your friends to a race!
You can see your stats at the end of each level. Copy your stats with the press of a button and share them on Twitter or other Social Media platforms to flex with your super awesome Unpogable skills.

Want to customize the look of your game? You can customize the color of every single object. Player, environment, one-way-platforms, slipper; almost everything. You'll unlock new colors by collecting Qubs in the daily challenge levels.

You play as a "Quboid". The Quboids are caught in an endless cycle of climbing to reach the Star to ascend to Elysium. Not many Quboids can make it to Elysium. But maybe you can?

name: Havendock
description: A simulation game where you build a town in the middle of the sea. Reach self-sufficiency, invite travelers to join you, then manage their needs and research new facilities to keep them happy. Build a submarine and discover islands to produce increasingly complex resources.

name: Tennis League VR
description: Tennis League VR is an arcade tennis simulator for Meta Quest, PICO devices and Steam VR. Learn and master real tennis techniques and use them for training in solo or multiplayer online matches.

name: Outer Terror
description:
An all-new hyper Minimalist stylized gameplay loop with advanced rogue-lite elements. Each player (1 or 2 players Co-Op) chooses from 10 survivors with various weapons and skills to battle against unending waves of otherworldly creatures.

As the difficulty increases, the player will be able to upgrade and gain new weapons and powers. Each map is massive and through exploration the player will discover other survivor hold outs and treasure.

name: Chicken Fall
description: "Chicken Fall" is a pixel-style horizontal shooting Roguelike game. The game was made by myself alone. In the game, the player controls the protagonist, the chicken boss, and with the help of friends, defeats the bandits in the forest composed of various carnivores.

name: OTXO
description: OTXO is a fast, brutal, violent roguelite, filled with precise but savage gunplay and time-bending slow motion.

name: Eresys
description: Eresys is a co-op game with horror elements inspired by H.P Lovecraft which focuses mainly on teamwork. A party of 4 players face together the fears of the Lovecraftian Universe. Featuring smart AI mechanics with horrifying entities that will make you regret stepping into the forest.

name: Arcana of Paradise: The Tower
description: Choose from 20 children and perfect your deck as you battle against The Tower's bizarre inhabitants in real time! Time your guards, combo your attacks, charge up powerful magic, and collect legendary relics in your search for food, as you guide the children to the bottom!

name: Wild Dogs
description: The world is under a frantic alien attack. Amidst the chaos and with the army virtually subdued, the deadliest and most inconsequential pair of specialists are called upon to do what must be done. Join the war hunting aliens around the world and in every way possible.

name: Coffee Talk: Episode 2 - Hibiscus & Butterfly
description: Dust off your coffee machine and prepare your warmest smile to meet your customers again in the second episode of the much loved coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator; Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly.

name: Teravit
description: Teravit is an open-world sandbox RPG where you can run, fly, dig, build, and explore the voxel world in your own unique way. Adventurers explore a vast, randomly generated world with a variety of biomes and cities with different characteristics, crafting equipment and items to take on strongholds of vicious monsters to save the world from the clutches of evil. Set forth on an adventure and create your own lasting story. Explore the map in earnest, collecting items, excavating terrain with explosives, and even creating block art. The ultimate goal in this open-world is yours to decide.

name: Mr. Sun's Hatbox
description: Mr. Sun’s Hatbox is a slapstick, roguelite platformer about getting the job done, no matter the cost. Upgrade your HQ, your team, and your tools so you can take on increasingly dangerous (and ridiculous) missions in pursuit of not only the hat you’ve lost, but as many hats as you can handle.

name: Zoeti
description: Zoeti is a card Battler game that combines Roguelike and poker. The Zoeti is a fantasy medieval world full of tarot cards, stars, souls, and magic. The art will be presented in bright and delicate hand-painted style.

name: Flashpoint Campaigns: Southern Storm
description:
Flashpoint Campaigns: Southern Storm is a grand tactical wargame set at the height of the Cold War, with the action centered on the year 1989. As the force Commander, you will plan and then issue orders and Standard Operating Procedures to your battalion, brigade, or regimental forces shaping the fight by maneuver and your intent.

The game engine is based on asynchronous WEGO turns. This means you will issue orders then watch a variable amount of time unfold on the battlefield. Then issue or adjust orders to react to what has happened as you execute your battle plan.

Flashpoint Campaigns: Southern Storm is a deep simulation of combat operations where your forces are arranged in maneuver units of companies, platoons, and sections of tanks, infantry fighting vehicles, infantry squads and teams, recon forces, engineers, air-defense and anti-tank systems, helicopters and more. As the Commander, you will need to use available off-map assets like long-range artillery, rockets, or airstrikes. You may be faced with the specter of using chemical or nuclear weapons to support your forces on the map and win the day.

The Manual: if you order a physical copy of the game, you will receive a hardbook manual. This hardcover 300-page full-color handbook leaves no stone unturned in fully documenting every aspect of the game system, from game mechanics to advanced systems and strategies as well as designer notes and helpful appendices.

name: Stray Blade
description:
What is Stray Blade?

Stray Blade is an action RPG where you master intense combat while exploring the ancient ruins of a lost civilization with your adventurous companion.

Key Features:

-Fast-paced intense combat with brutal finishing moves
-Explore towering throne rooms of giant god-kings and long-lost cities
-Experience death as part of your hero's journey where every time you get revived, something new is waiting for you
-Every step of your quest to master the Acrean elements brings change to the world.

name: Namariel Legends: Iron Lord
description: Namariel Legends: Iron Lord takes place in the magical land of Namariel, where magic and science join together. The game is played from the first person; you will see the world through the eyes of king’s daughter, who was overthrown by the brutal Iron Lord.

name: Tin Hearts
description: Guide squads of tin soldiers to safety through this magical toy filled world. A beautiful VR puzzle game with a heartfelt story. Are you guiding the soldiers or are they guiding you?

name: Two Men Go On A Date And Don't Fall In Love
description: but maybe they can find something else in common?

name: Jungla Gráfica
description: Sin descripción

name: Pizza Tower: Idle Tycoon
description:
Pizza Tower is an exciting simulation game! In Pizza Tower, you can make pizzas, sell them, and earn money to build the pizza tower with new floors. You can also attract customers by offering other foods such as cola, nuggets, and french fries.

Have fun with Pizza Tower and work to build the tallest tower!

name: Rarity
description:
slowly reassemble the new landscapes

Short little 3D, first person narrative game about life continuing after COVID and the weird time skip that occurred for people as their lives drastically changed in an ephemeral but 3 year time period.

Explores themes around University, friendships, the feeling of time passing and it being over before it's begun.

name: Ospesjel
description: A short story about the soul of a book making a five-year pact with a trickster spirit to turn her into a human. The five years are almost up, and as she slowly turns back into a novel, she returns to the spirit to beg it to keep her human by any means necessary.

name: Space Mutants
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome to the Anime Club
description: Welcome to the Anime Club is a parody mod for Doki Doki Literature Club. The mod features the MC and Monika, who have both had a falling out with each other, fighting over the future of the literature club.

name: Panel Room: Escape Game
description:
You are trapped in "SOMEWHERE". Solve all the mysteries and escape from here.

This game is different from ordinary escape games in that you are trying to escape by solving the rules of the room.

At first, you may not understand what is going on, but if you do certain things, the whole picture of the room will be revealed little by little.

Aim to escape while understanding the rules of the room little by little.

name: QuantAttack
description:
QuantAttack is an action puzzle game.
The rules are based on the theory of quantum computers, and you can learn how they work as you play.

name: What Lies Beneath
description: You have heard rumors of demonic activity in an old gothic mansion. But there's more to it than meets the eye. Time to find out... What lies beneath. What Lies Beneath is a private project made by some of the contributors in Hellevator, Skulltiverse and Solar Struggle community projects. It features 11 maps created.

name: WWE 2K23: Steiner Row Pack
description: Get ready to hit that Frankensteiner with the Steiner Row Pack in WWE 2K23. Featuring the franchise debut of The Steiner Bros, along with Hit Row, which includes Top Dolla, Ashante Adonis, and B-Fab as the group’s manager. The Steiner Row Pack is already included in the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: Zelda's Adventure
description:
In the 1990s Nintendo made a deal with Philips to develop 3 Zelda titles. The first 2 were side scrolling platformers, similar to Zelda II, and the third was a traditional top-down action adventure game.

Zelda’s Adventure looked interesting and it would be fun to play on a portable system. The Game Boy was chosen because of the existing Zelda games on the system.

The game sticks to the aesthetics of Link’s Awakening, but also incorporates some features from Oracle of Ages and Oracle of Seasons.

This is a complete port of the CDi original and was developed in GB Studio, with a few modifications.

name: B Cannon
description:
B Cannon is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are moving around the screen and can reverse your direction by pressing a button. Your goal is to shoot the circles that are bouncing around. You aim automatically and shoot at the current aim position. Hold a button to shoot. The circles break up into smaller ones and you have to shoot them until they can no longer be broken down.

The game is over when you touch any circle.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: DLC Pack 10
description:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with the tenth DLC pack!

This additional content includes:

- "Wild Head" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Wild Body" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Wild Arms" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Wild Waist" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Wild Legs" Hunter layered armor piece
- "Rondine" Hunter layered armor set

name: Pixel Paint: Complete Edition
description: Have fun and relax in Pixel Paint. Choose from a wide range of drawings, and expand your pixel art gallery!

name: Brain Memory: Complete Edition
description:
Help your child harness the hidden potential of their mind. Use these colorfull cards to improve their memory skills.
Brain Memory improves on the classic formula of memory games. It lets you increase the difficulty level at your own pace, and customize challenges to one's taste.

Our brains are the most important tools of the XXI century. Do your child a favor, and give thema gift that will help them reach their full potential.

Let them become masters of their own minds with the Figures Pack!

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 2023 GT World Challenge Pack
description: Assetto Corsa Competizione 2023 GT World Challenge DLC places you at the heart of the action from the 2023 season. This brand new DLC adds an additional 3 new cars as well as the world-famous track, Circuit Ricardo Tormo - Valencia.

name: NHL 23
description: NHL 23 is a rom hacked that updates NHL ‘94 for the 2023 playoffs. The hack aims to provide the most refined and realistic modern versions of this all-time classic game.

name: Teslagrad Power Pack Edition
description: Return to the indie classic Teslagrad and discover another tower in the magnetic North in Teslagrad 2.

name: Space Defend
description: Defend the earth from incoming asteroids. Hit asteroids to destroy them. Survive the Waves.

name: Teslagrad Remastered
description: Teslagrad Remastered is an updated version of the original Teslagrad, developed by Rain Games and released in 2023. This remastered edition features enhanced graphics, improved animations, and updated sound design while retaining the core puzzle-platforming mechanics of the original game. Players continue to use magnetism and electricity to navigate puzzles and obstacles within a mysterious tower, with the remastered version providing a refined visual and auditory experience.

name: Crying Pony
description: Crying Pony is a 2D side-scrolling horror game where the protagonist, Michael, is hunted by the lurking evil in his nightmares. As the nightmare's corruption seeps into reality and even pulls Michael's daughter into its grasp, will he be able to lead them both to escape from the nightmare?

name: Lovely Nurse
description: Lovely Nurse is a soothing puzzle game that offers players a chance to unwind while solving puzzles. Complete each puzzle while enjoying beautiful pictures of hot girls.

name: Little Turrets
description: Build turret defenses to survive, gradually expanding your territory to escape to the next level. Lightweight and polished game with infinite levels and a global leaderboard.

name: Lost Epic: Premium Edition
description: This is the story of a knight who would slay the gods themselves.

name: Secret Agent: Cold War Espionage
description: A stealthy third-person shooter adventure! Use a pistol, binoculars, and high jump mechanics to complete seven thrilling missions, solving puzzles, wiretapping conversations, defusing bombs, and cracking heads!

name: Dysmantle: Doomsday
description: Board a mysterious flying cargo drone and enter a hidden archipelago holding a deadly secret. Discover scientific experiments gone awry and utilize new technologies to stave off doomsday.

name: Depths of Helheim
description: "Depths of Helheim" is a solo Action-RPG Adventure game, based on Norse mythology, explore the Nine Worlds and use your abilities to defend yourself from abominations.

name: Tank Kingdoms
description: Medieval world RPG, large scale tank warfare.

name: Furry Reich
description: Furry Reich - an exciting game consisting of a series of exciting mini-novels with fluffy girls. Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere.

name: Horizon Forbidden West: Burning Shores
description:
Travel beyond the Forbidden West as Aloy’s story continues. Encounter new machines and a compelling new story.

South of the Tenakth Clan Lands, millennia of volcanic eruptions and violent seismic activity have carved the ruins of Los Angeles into a treacherous archipelago. Experience the next chapter of Horizon Forbidden West as Aloy pursues a sinister new threat to the planet, hidden among these dangerous, untamed wilds.

name: Mafia Pigs
description: Can you save your friends from Boris the Baconator's deep dungeon? Sneak, persuade, fight and puzzle your way through the pig mafia world in this action packed multiplayer micro-RPG. Assemble your crack team, carry out missions and save your family, or topple the mafia boss himself!

name: Girls! Girls! Girls!?
description: Step into Girls! Girls! Girls!? Café in this heartwarming, romance-filled visual novel. As the new manager, charm your way into the hearts of 4 captivating "ladies", throw parties, tackle unruly customers, and create unforgettable memories in a tale full of fluff and love!

name: Nutty Motorcars
description: Nutty Motorcars is a classic video game with a new point of view. Up to eight players on a single screen can battle it out in these crazy races. Jumps, bridges, tunnels and many more obstacles. Discover the 30 circuits available in the full version and race on them with 20 different vehicles.

name: Teslagrad 2
description: Teslagrad 2 is the sequel to the original Teslagrad, developed by Rain Games and released in 2023. This 2D puzzle platformer builds upon the magnetic and electrical mechanics of its predecessor, with players once again using these abilities to solve puzzles and traverse complex environments. Set in a new region, the game introduces new powers, enemies, and challenges, while maintaining the visual storytelling and atmospheric design characteristic of the series.

name: Amid Evil VR
description: A retro FPS for the ages! Completely rebuilt from the ground up for VR! Once branded a heretic, now you have been chosen as our champion! Reclaim our sacred weapons. Take back our ancient lands. If you can stand... Amid Evil.

name: Meta World: My City
description:
Welcome to Meta World: My City, the sequel to Let's Get Rich,
enjoyed by over 200 million players around the world!

name: 24 Solar Terms
description: 24 Solar Terms is a seek and find puzzle game with the theme of the traditional Chinese twenty-four solar terms. The game connects the climate and farming of various solar terms through farming proverbs, myths and fables. Help local farmers solve problems and experience the story of 24 solar terms.

name: Gun Jam
description: GUN JAM is a rhythm first-person shooter where the player must shoot to the beat to survive. It features an original core mechanic and firefights choreographed to the soundtrack in a vibrant world. Prepare to obliterate enemies whilst blasting to the beat.

name: Moons of Darsalon
description: Retro action "save-them-all" platformer including advanced physics combined with unique rendering pipeline for a consistent retro feel while still using modern lightning. Complete several rescue missions in which you will have to lead companion NPCs to the closest base station.

name: Three Kingdoms Fantasy: Miss Meng and the Explosive Boy
description:
Page information from rewritten results of google translate.

A fantasy visual novel with an original story based on the three kingdoms setting, using
familiar names in new ways.

The game is about a 1000 year old dispute that has spanned multiple lifetimes restarted once again.
An ordinary college student that is caught up in it embarks on a unique and wonderful journey.

name: Royal Jigsaw 4
description: 10 centuries of history, the luxury interiors of ancient houses, and the most famous castles in the world in the new Royal Jigsaw 4!

name: Make My Life Worse
description: It's the year 2022, in a world where a few people suddenly started developing superpowers during the 20th century. This is highly rare and still not fully understood. Some use their powers for good, some for evil, and some just use it as a tool for daily life or in their careers. Marnie Yao happens to be one of those rare few who has a superpower. But she doesn't really care about any of that. No, what's really important is that she's heartbroken after finding out her favorite VTuber is ending activities, and in that sad state of feeling miserable about it is where our strange tale begins.

name: A Tavern at Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Space Explorer's Galactic Ball Set
description:
Go boldly where no racer has gone before, with the Space Explorer's Galactic Ball Set.
After purchase, these items will appear in the Garage section of Turbo Golf Racing.

name: 3001 Pages: A fairy tale for 33
description: Sin descripción

name: Raging Blitz
description: The war has come to an end and the victory has already been decided, but the futile battle still continues. The last mission was launched to leave as many survivors as possible. The pilot, Rei, and the mechanic, Ritsu, were on board their own machine (MMII), The two also attempted to leave the frontline for survival. The last mission is to survive.

name: American Truck Simulator: Steampunk Paint Jobs Pack
description: This pack is the perfect way to add some personality and style to your rig, with a single unique paint job for every truck, three common paints for all trucks, and two corresponding variants for ownable trailers.

name: Jumperino
description: Discover Jumperino: an easy to learn but hard to master platformer where every jump matters. Plan your jumps carefully: a slight mistake can get you all the way down. Practice makes perfect! Try different jump angles and power, experiment and discover new worlds. There's only one possible way: up! Master the gameplay and you'll master the Moon!

name: Sweet Dreams
description: A short horror visual novel where you're starting to feel a bit sleepy on the train. Will you find friendship? Or will you find trouble...

name: Disney Speedstorm: Deluxe Founder's Pack
description: Take the track by storm with the Deluxe Founder's Pack!

name: League of Enthusiastic Losers: Complete Edition
description: Just because others call you a loser, doesn't mean you are one. Make the journey to the 90s Moscow and experience an adventure about friendship and finding your true self.

name: Defectum
description: Defectum is a virtual reality (VR) experience that seeks to express and give players a sense of the fear of failure by utilizing and visualizing my personal experiences and transforming them into a VR experience. Players are given the opportunity to take a “walk in my shoes” and view the world through an intimate lens—they will face feelings and emotions such as anxiety, unease, and a loss of hope and are encouraged to take their time to explore and experience the visuals that are presented to them.

name: Mystery Case Files: The Last Resort
description: A ski resort high in the mountains hides a dark past!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Bakery
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Sports
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Plants
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Plants 2
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Candy
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Toys
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Bar Drinks
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle World: Mediterranean Food
description: Add 20 new puzzles to your Jigsaw Puzzle World game.

name: Cave Crawler
description: Cave Crawler is a short horror game where you pilot a drone into a cave and discover something horrible.

name: PowerWash Simulator: The Muckingham Files
description: The Muckingham Files will take you to never-before-seen places from the original universe of the base game, with new characters, locations and stories. Get to know more about your stomping ground and its inhabitants as the most in-demand power washer in town.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - GOTY Edition
description: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys GOTY Edition is a fun-centric party game which throws you (along with your friends) into a series of challenges and races throughout randomly generated tracks. Enjoy new decorations and get ready for loads of fun.

name: Disney Speedstorm: Ultimate Founder's Pack
description: Go full throttle in style with the Ultimate Founder's Pack!

name: Disney Speedstorm: Standard Founder's Pack
description: Start your engines and hit the track with the Standard Founder's Pack!

name: Family Chess: Magnificent Edition
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: Shielded Souls: Legendary Love
description:
You've always had a strong sense of justice, but you never knew where it came from until a freak landslide sends you to another world—your home world! As you acclimate to this new land, you realize you have the ability to strengthen the powers of others through physical contact... and the more intimate that contact is, the stronger the effect!

Party up with three gorgeous heroines to uncover the truth behind your past and save your home from the wrath of The Demon Lord!

name: Construction Simulator: JCB Pack
description:
The JCB Pack further enhances your Construction Simulator experience with six brand-new machines. Enjoy more variety when tackling your construction contracts!

The JCB Pack includes:

• 1CXT – Backhoe Loader
• 220X – Excavator
• 457 – Wheel Loader
• 4CX – Backhoe Loader
• 540-180 – Telehandler
• 6T-2 – Site Dumper

name: Graveyard Keeper: Last Journey Edition
description: The ultimate Graveyard Keeper experience with a complete set of all 4 DLCs!

name: Don't Destroy The Rocket
description:
In this small but nice action game you control a rocket and have to bring it safely to the target. Try not to collide with the environment, because that is not good for the rocket. You have the tools you need to get ahead. There is also a hidden collectible in each level.
Are you curious? What are you waiting for. Download Don't Destroy The Rocket today and become a rocket master.

name: Hentai Casual Swap 2
description: Enjoy our newest and sexiest casual tile swap puzzle with dozens of nice illustrations for you to enjoy and relax. With a gallery for simply relaxing! Unlock all the pictures!

name: Curse of the Corsair
description: Echoes of a swashbuckling and treacherous past reverberate through a vast and untamed sea, brimming with riches and danger. In this action-packed adventure RPG, you'll set sail on a journey inspired by the modern classic Hyper Light Drifter, but with a salty, scurvy twist.

name: The Rebirth of Kingdom Lo
description: This game is a conversational RPG, depicting the story of the kemono prince and six princesses, in order to revive the kingdom and reproduce their offspring.

name: Jewel Match Aquascapes: Collector's Edition
description: Dive into a wondrous Match-3 undersea world and let the cares of life drift away! Make matches across sprawling coral reef levels, and collect sparkling treasures to restore magnificent maritime mansions to their erstwhile splendor.

name: Zippy Detective: Cats Hidden
description: A puzzle game where you have to act like a detective to find the hidden cats in the city. Find all the cats and send them to space.

name: Idle Biceps
description: Get ready to pump some iron and grow your biceps like never before in Idle Biceps, the ultimate idle clicker game for fitness enthusiasts! Start off as a novice gym-goer and work your way up to becoming a ripped bodybuilder by clicking your way to bigger and better gains.

name: Hitman Party
description: Get ready to join the ultimate hitman party - a fast-paced and hilarious local multiplayer game for up to 6 players. Can you blend in with the crowd, outsmart your friends, and be the first to hunt down the target? Experience the thrill of multiple game modes with your friends!

name: Infected
description: First Person Survival

name: Deathchron
description: Deathchron is an action side scroller where you play as a kid that finds an amazing mech to save the world.

name: The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story - Deluxe Edition
description: The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story Deluxe Edition includes the Silverwing Supply Station Pack, the Home Sweet Cave Pack, the Hijacked Spells Pack, and the Unchained Skins Pack.

name: Europa Universalis IV: Domination
description: Revisit some of the most powerful and popular nations in EUIV Domination. This Expansion Pack offers new mission trees, new government reforms, new estate management and new events for several of the major powers in the game.

name: The Sewer Job
description: You were on the brink of becoming homeless, but that's when you found a sewer job application, you got accepted. What seemed like a chill work at first turned quickly in to an unsettling experience.

name: The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story
description:
Developed by Digital Sun, creators of Moonlighter, The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story is an action RPG that takes place in the League of Legends universe. In the kingdom of Demacia, the Mageseekers hold the power to oppress magic-using citizens in the name of public order–by inducting and indoctrinating them, locking them away, or driving them into hiding.

Play as Sylas, a spell-stealing mage who has just broken free of his unjust captivity at the Mageseekers’ hands. Wielding the chains that once bound you, you must liberate your homeland from tyranny, one Mageseeker at a time.

name: Mercenaries Lament: Requiem of the Silver Wolf
description: Mercenaries Lament is a tactical simulation RPG set in a fantasy world.

name: Minecraft: Legends - Deluxe Edition
description: Includes the base game and six additional skins.

name: Trade Bots: A Technical Analysis Simulation
description: Trade Bots is an educational simulation game featuring technical analysis and algorithmic trading. Decide when to buy or sell an unknown stock based solely on patterns and technical indicators. As your profit increases, unlock upgrades that help expedite and automate gameplay with bots.

name: Dire Destiny: Time Travel
description: Dire Destiny: Time Travel is a deck building game set in a steampunk apocalypse.

name: God of Rock
description: God of Rock blends rhythm-based gameplay with fighting game mechanics in tense 1v1 matches. Choose from a dozen unique fighters, each with their own design, mechanics, and harmonic attacks. Soften up your opponent by executing normal moves and building meter by hitting notes to the beat of the song, then spend your meter to unleash EX and special moves do damage and add complexity to their tracks. Finally, finish them off with a devastating Super attack! As the battle progresses, the music track will continue to grow in complexity and difficulty until only one fighter is left standing!

name: Desktop Dungeons: Rewind
description: Desktop Dungeons: Rewind bestows bites of tactical roguelike action, which will quickly fester into a deep, lingering, and strategic obsession. Bargain with gods, equip your spoon and pick your battles, before retreating into the healing darkness. But beware… there are still many monsters to face!

name: Minecraft: Legends
description: Discover the mysteries of Minecraft Legends, a new action strategy game. Explore a gentle land of rich resources and lush biomes on the brink of destruction. The ravaging piglins have arrived, and it’s up to you to inspire your allies and lead them in strategic battles to save the Overworld!

name: Three Kingdom: The Journey
description: Three Kingdom: The Journey is an deck build roguelike game, fight to the end or journey back are all on your choices.

name: Shieldwall
description: Stand closer. Hit harder.

name: Stream Train
description: Twitch integrated game where viewers use chat commands to guess if cards will be higher or lower to avoid obstacles. Ideal for Starting Soon or Break scenes.

name: One More Wish
description: Wander, jump, and fly upon the clouds, collects stars to grow your energy, help guffy villagers with their wishes, and finally rerun the abandoned ferris wheel. Life is not of great goals or loud slogans but of negligible yet sparkling wishes.

name: Crack in the Sky
description: Medium-sized floating castle ruins map ("15-20 minutes") with an interconnected layout inspired by level design tropes in From Software's games. Requires Copper v1.20+

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Tech Jet Supporters Pack
description: Level up your look and prepare to tear up the fairways with the legendary Tech Jet Supporters Pack.

name: Titans Clinic VR
description: Explore Titans Clinic - a casual VR game, you are a dental doctor for the Titans! A titan comes to you with problems and your task is to find solutions for them using various tools inside the game!

name: Super Cat Tales: Paws
description:
Adventure awaits in this cat-tastic game from the Super Cat Tales series.
Join the PAWS team on a secret mission to protect Neko Land. Super Cat Tales: PAWS is the ultimate platformer game with cute cats and hours of fun. Explore amazing levels, complete daily quests, play mini-games, and customize your cats with fancy hats.

name: Mojito the Cat: Premium Edition
description: Jump into action in this quirky puzzle game. Travel the world along with an adorable cat named Mojito (or one of his friends).

name: Legends Scrolls
description: Legends Scrolls is an idle RPG game. Join the warriors all over the grand land of Adela to fight the darkness behind the scenes with your teammates, and save the cursed world for the truth. The five main elements of water, fire, wind, light, and dark will help you all the way! Start your adventure now!

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 7: The Familiar Places
description: Story: You are now playing as another person and you get brought to one of the company by Yukari because she wanted to make you have a skill on spotting the anomalies by using the simulation that this company provided to you. You'll be doing a watcher duty job inside the simulation in a very familiar places.

name: Funny Sunny
description: Get ready to shine bright and collect the stars in the whimsical world of 'Funny Sunny' - the ultimate billiards-style game!

name: Stelarace
description: Welcome to Stellarace, the ultimate space roller skating game where players can choose from four different avatars to race through the galaxy, competing against each other to be the fastest skater in the universe!

name: Marionette Mates
description: Marionette Mates is a powerful pngtuber application with multiplayer support. Marionette Mates allows you to use the provided assets or ones you create as virtual avatars to create an online presence alone or with friends.

name: Soulvester vs. Lil' Beezey
description: Show Lil' Beezey who the boss of Winkletown is in this addictive and fast paced 2D action roguelite! Created from scratch in only 14 days and nominated for GDWC Game Jam GOTY, Soulvester comes to Steam for the first time, now with controller support and achievements!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Sci-Fi
description: Sci-Fi images!

name: Techbrawlogy: Into the RoboDome
description: Techbrawlogy: Into the RoboDome is a multiplayer split-screen beat 'em up with cartoon-styled characters. Players can cooperate with their team to fight robots, charging up their super meters to perform powerful attacks while doing so.

name: AI Story Quest
description: An Illustrated and Narrated AI Dungeon Master. An interactive storybook for an immersive ChatGPT experience. Get your own personal storybook, or try it out for free.

name: Phantom-OS
description: Phantom-OS is a physics-infused strategic hacking simulator where you will put your skills and wits to the test.

name: Madgun
description: Madgun - fast-paced, old-school first-person shooter with 90s graphics where you need to score the most points by killing monsters. Destroy all enemies and complete a special mission.

name: The War
description: "The War" is a unique real-time war game. It has the fierce war of RTS, aircraft tank, missile laser; It is a real strategic game, operating base, expanding territory, and planning vertically and horizontally; Drive the Core Gear to command the battlefield to change the dark and turbulent world!

name: The Traveler's Path
description: In "The Traveler's Path", you have to help the character reach his destination by swapping and rotating the pieces of the path. The pieces need to fit together correctly to form the perfect path. Test your thinking and logic skills in this challenging puzzle game.

name: Reflex King of Elements
description: Reflex King of Elements is a one player game also 2D-platformer game with 10 of the hardest levels! It has 6 strong enemies you have to fight throughout the game with traps in different variations! This game come with its own health bar, stamina bar, fire blast count and money count with no time!

name: Energy Survivors
description: Energy Survivors is a third-person shooter roguelite where you play as a space soldier. Invade a hostile planet in search of its energy source. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds.

name: Editor's Hell
description: It’s been two days since you assigned to the editor job on the newspaper. After months of unemployment; you just had to took it. Maybe you have no idea how to do this but; you have a family to look after. Dreams, nightmares, don’t matter anymore; you have a new opportunity in your life.
